DOC.brief_summary: The investigators aim to study the impact of a strategy of a intensive glycemic control in patients undergoing cardiac surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Control of Hyperglycemia After Cardiac Surgery: CHyCS Trial
DOC.criteria: Patients undergoing heart surgery; Age greater than 18 years; Sign the informed consent form; Capillary blood glucose greater than 200mg/dL ICU admission Admitted for surgical repair of congenital heart defects; Dialytic Chronic renal failure; Participation in other research protocol; Diagnosis of HIV/AIDS; Pregnant.
